```{r}
library(forecast)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(TSstudio)
library(Quandl)
library(h2o)
```

```{r}
data("Coffee_Prices")

ts_info(Coffee_Prices)
```

```{r}
head(Coffee_Prices)
```

```{r}
ts_plot(Coffee_Prices,
        title = "Robusta and Arabica Coffee Monthly Prices",
        Xtitle = "Year",
        Ytitle = "Price in USD")
```

```{r}
robusta <- Coffee_Prices[,1]
arabica <- Coffee_Prices[,2]
```

```{r}
ts_plot(robusta,
        title = "The Robusta Coffee Monthly Prices",
        Ytitle = "Price in USD",
        Xtitle = "Year")
```

```{r}
ts_plot(arabica,
        title = "The Robusta Coffee Monthly Prices",
        Ytitle = "Price in USD",
        Xtitle = "Year")
```
